mapper.select: SELECT item_code, round(avg(b.star), 1), count(b.content) FROM reviewboard b WHERE item_code = #{itemCode};

select a.item_code, a.item_tag_main, a.item_image, a.item_name, a.item_summary, a.item_price_m, a.item_price_m_sub, round(avg(b.star), 1), count(b.content) from item a left join reviewboard b on a.item_code=b.item_code where a.item_tag_main=#{tagMain} group by a.item_code order by rand() Limit 9;

select a.subscribe_code, a.subscribe_tag_main, a.subscribe_image, a.subscribe_name, a.subscribe_summary, a.subscribe_price_m, a.subscribe_price_m_sub, round(avg(b.star), 1), count(b.content) from subscribe a left join reviewboard b on a.subscribe_code = b.subscribe_code where a.subscribe_tag_main = #{tagMain} group by a.subscribe_code order by rand() limit 9;
